mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, p.hots, p.picture, p.user_id, u.name user_name, u.head user_head, u.bio user_bio, c.id comment_id, c.content comment_content, c.poke comment_poke, c.hoot comment_hoot, c.create_time comment_time from product p,user u,product_comment c where p.user_id = u.id and p.id = c.product_id group by c.product_id order by p.create_time desc limit #{page},20

select p.id, p.name, p.hots, p.picture, p.user_id, p.favorite_num, p.order_link, p.price, p.create_time, u.name user_name, u.head user_head, u.bio user_bio from product p,user u where p.user_id = u.id and p.id = #{id}

select p.id, p.name, p.hots, p.user_id, p.picture, u.name user_name, u.head user_head, c.id comment_id, c.content comment_content, c.poke comment_poke, c.hoot comment_hoot, c.create_time comment_time from product p,user u,product_comment c where p.user_id = u.id and p.id = c.product_id group by c.product_id order by p.hots desc limit 30
